page.title: 11Life Style: Child's View
page.content: "I usually rise at 7:30 AM, watch T.V whilst eating breakfast, which is generally, tea, cereal and toast. I walk to my Primary School (ages 4-11), meeting my friends on the way. School starts at 9.00am, after registration, we usually have a religious assembly. After assembly we continue with our work, most mornings we concentrate on Maths and English though on Tuesdays and Wednesdays we have Art and Health Education. Other subjects we study are Environmental Studies, Music, Science, Handwork, Physical Education and Games. We use a computer one day a week to help us study. At break we play a variety of games including football, donkey rides, hide and seek, rocket ride (which is dangerous) skipping and various chasing games. Some of us bring our own sandwiches to school for dinner, some have school
